casebody.data:
[Hillsborough,

December, 1882.] Patterson, Guard., v. Hall. Sulloway, Topliff O' Connor and J. P. Bartlett, for the plaintiff. Briggs ¿f* liase and J. C. Bickford, for the defendant.

Bill in Equity, to set aside a deed, and for an account of rents and profits of certain real estate, alleging that the deed was obtained by fraud. A referee found that the deed was not obtained by fraud.

Judgment for the defendant.

Stanley, J., did not sit: the others concurred.
